Here’s a Dedicated Server deal for you all, direct from an actual datacenter operator - QuadraNet, AS8100 🙂 Free IP Announcements and BGP sessions available.

By choosing to deploy your dedicated server with QuadraNet, you will receive true 24x7 on-site support from an actual datacenter provider that cares for its customers. We are not resellers!

**E3 Miami Dedicated Server – Limited Time Offer**

*This offer includes 3Gbps of QuadraNet VEST DDoS Mitigation.*

* Intel Xeon E3-1240v3 Quad Core – 3.40Ghz, 8M Cache, 5GT/s DMI, HyperThreading
* 8GB RAM
* 1TB SATA 7,200RPM Enterprise HDD
* 10TB Monthly Traffic
* 100Mbps Uplink
* /29 IPv4 – 5 Usable IPs
* /64 IPv6 – Millions of IPs
* KVM over IP, Remote Power Control
* $49/month  **($20 FIRST MONTH)**
* **INCLUDES** : Noction Intelligent Routing Platform Enabled Network
* **INCLUDES** : 3Gbps Detect &amp; Mitigate QuadraNet VEST DDoS Protection
* [[Order Now](https://blog.quadranet.com/miami-e3-dedicated-server-sale-20-first-month/)]
